titleStmt.title: A nevv catalogue of the dukes, marquesses, earles, viscounts, barons, that sit in this present Parliament. Begunne at VVestminster the 3 of Novem. 1640. and continued to this time. VVherein the reader may take notice, that those who have deserted the Parliament since it began, their names are deciphered with this figure *: likewise those that are dead, with the letter, d.
titleStmt.author: Walkley, Thomas, d. 1658?

titleStmt.title: A nevv catalogue of the dukes, marquesses, earles, viscounts, barons, that sit in this present Parliament. Begunne at VVestminster the 3 of Novem. 1640. and continued to this time. VVherein the reader may take notice, that those who have deserted the Parliament since it began, their names are deciphered with this figure *: likewise those that are dead, with the letter, d.
titleStmt.author: Walkley, Thomas, d. 1658?

editionStmt.edition: The fifth impression, corrected and much amended.

notesStmt.note: The title page is partly in the same setting as that of Wing N591.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
